data.text:
The artist residency program is dedicated to providing a comprehensive range of support, including accommodation, transportation, studio space, art supplies, studio assistance, exhibition curation, promotion, and sales.

The residency program invites creative minds to contribute to the rich tapestry of Chengdu’s cultural inheritance. This program will run from June 2024 onwards. The program offers full support and sponsorship for the residency experience and artistic creation process.

If you are an emerging artist looking for an unparalleled opportunity to create, collaborate, and grow, we invite you to apply for the Artists Residency at CHART. Submission is free and opens from August 2023 to March 31, 2024. All details such as the length of residency will be announced once your submission has been accepted.

To apply our residency program, please send the following information to AllenTang@chengduhouseofart.com and info@chengduhouseofart.com

– Name and contact information

– A short description of your interest and specialization

– A detailed proposal outlining the project’s goals, methodology

– An evaluation of the roughly estimated cost for their project and potential impact

– A description of how the residency program would support your artistic development.

– A portfolio of your previous works

– Proposed residency time and duration

Join us in nurturing a global community of creatives, and let’s create art that resonates through time and space.
